title: Declan + Coraline
description: You Donâ€™t Find Love, It Finds You.Declan + Coraline takes place two years before the start of the Ruthless People. Twenty-three-year-old Coraline Wilson is fresh out of college and just wants to experience life to the fullest for the first time. On her journey towards self-discovery, she ends up meeting twenty-seven-year-old Declan Callahan. They fall for each other hard and fast . . . but their families may prove to be problematic . . .
author: J.J. McAvoy
